title: Pasta Sauce
ingredients: 6 oz sun-dried tomatoes in olive oil

directions.text: Process onion, and garlic until fine.
Heat oil up in a large pot on medium, and cook onion and garlic for 5 mins.
Process tomatoes with juice, sun dried tomatoes, wine and pepper flakes till desired consistency.
Add tomato mixture to pot and simmer for 20 mins.
Sprinkle finely chopped basil in, along with salt and pepper.
